name: Daemons!
description:
In this game you play as a witch, with her 2 friends going to the Witches Sabbath (a gathering of witches). Out of no where a horde of Daemons (demons) hits and it is your job to dodge them as long as you can while your friends banish them. Survive for as long as you can! Compete with friends for the highest score!

CONTROLS: Move Up = Up Arrow

Move Down = Down Arrow

Ill be updating the game as new progress is made
